message.content:
1. A prospective, randomized trial was performed.
2. The trial was international.
3. The trial was a multicentre trial.
4. The trial included 69 patients.
5. The trial was performed to compare computer-assisted TKA (CAS-TKA).
6. The CAS-TKA used either mini-midvastus or standard medial parapatellar approach.
7. The mini-midvastus approach was used in the MIS group.
8. The standard medial parapatellar approach was used in the conventional group.

messages.content:
Statement: A prospective, randomized, international multicentre trial including 69 patients was performed to compare computer-assisted TKA (CAS-TKA) using either mini-midvastus (MIS group) or standard medial parapatellar approach (conventional group).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
